'''Beta 1.7.0.5''' is the third beta version released for [[Bedrock Edition 1.7.0]], released on September 7, 2018,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360015664351-Minecraft-Beta-1-7-0-5-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.7.0.5 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)}}</ref> which fixes several bugs.

== Fixes ==

* Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay
* Phantoms now always swoop down and attack people properly ({{bug|MCPE-36673}})
* Fixed blocks often disappearing after being placed or reappearing after being destroyed ({{bug|MCPE-31596}})
* Several fixes to reduce lag in multiplayer games
* Guests rejoining in a different order than they joined for the first time no longer generate different progress during split-screen gameplay
* Fixed incorrect button focus on the chat screen
* Isotropic settings are once again respected when altered in {{cd|blocks.json}}
* Blocks in the inventory once again follow the textures set in {{cd|blocks.json}}
* Blockshapes are once again included in {{cd|blocks.json}}</onlyinclude>
